org.spongepowered.api.text.message

Interface MessageBuilder.Selector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MessageBuilder
    Enclosing interface:
    MessageBuilder

    public static interface MessageBuilder.Selector
extends MessageBuilder
    Represents a MessageBuilder creating immutable Message.Selector instances.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.text.message.MessageBuilder

        MessageBuilder.Score, MessageBuilder.Selector, MessageBuilder.Text, MessageBuilder.Translatable
